# See the Unseen (Master Trick)
## Overview
*See the Unseen (Su)*: A ninja with this trick learns how to see that which cannot be seen. As a swift action, the ninja can cast *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]*, using her level as the caster level. Each use of this ability uses up 1 *ki* point.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 17
